channel.title: Help with some simple stuff im N3W?
channel.description:
hey guys, and girls, or things, im new to coding and i need to figure out how to add objects into the server and to addd where you teleport when you click on the home tab can abyone help me? i'd appreshiate it,
sincerly, w4rf4c3.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2008, 12:45:05 pm[/size][hr]anyone help, i know someone can...?

item.title: Help with some simple stuff im N3W?
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

makeGlobalObject(3565, 3289, 4965, 0, 10);

first 2 are coords first is the x coords second is the y coords. Third number is the object number. 0 is the way you want it to face and keep 10 as it is.

-3 = south | -2 = east | -1 = north | 0 = west

Read full topic
item.source: Help with some simple stuff im N3W?

item.title: Help with some simple stuff im N3W?
item.dc:creator: @baez9 baez9
item.description:
@baez9 wrote:

[quote=“ballin2005, post:4, topic:254054”]Umm…
To add objects look for “Makeglobalobject” in your client

makeGlobalObject(3565, 3289, 4965, 0, 10);

The first 2 numbers are X , Y coordinate the location where you want to put your item 0 is where you want your item to face. and 10 is the item ID

Home teleport’s are located either in clickingmost.JAVA Client.JAVA or player.JAVA
Just click “home teleport” and do ::mypos and it should give you X and Y coordinates and you simply search for either of those coordinates in your JAVA files[/quote]Ok, the makeGlobalObject is wrong this is how you type it: makeGlobalObject
if you were to make a bank booth, you would type it like this

[code]makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, 0, 10); the 4 x’s are the X coords and the 4 y’s are the y coords when you do ::mypos.

For the Home, go into client.java and search the home coords and change them to your liking. @ balling, the how you told him to change it was wrong, that only works for deltascape and i think 2specced[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Help with some simple stuff im N3W?

item.title: Help with some simple stuff im N3W?
item.dc:creator: @ballin2005 ballin2005
item.description:
@ballin2005 wrote:

Umm…
To add objects look for “Makeglobalobject” in your client

makeGlobalObject(3565, 3289, 4965, 0, 10);

The first 2 numbers are X , Y coordinate the location where you want to put your item 0 is where you want your item to face. and 10 is the item ID

Home teleport’s are located either in clickingmost.JAVA Client.JAVA or player.JAVA
Just click “home teleport” and do ::mypos and it should give you X and Y coordinates and you simply search for either of those coordinates in your JAVA files

Read full topic
